Can’t get rid of .md files 1 new_session: yes example

Can’t get rid of .md files 1 new_session: yes example The contents of _bookdown.yml are: output_dir: docs new_session: yes delete_merged_file: true edit: https://github.com/minimumexample/keepmarkdownfalse/edit/master/%s view: https://github.com/minimumexample/keepmarkdownfalse/blob/master/%s and the contents of _output.yml are: bookdown::gitbook: keep_md: false yet docs/index.md remains after rendering. The same is the case with bookdown::render_book("index.Rmd", new_session = TRUE, clean = TRUE) In addition, despite including delete_merged_file: true, _main.rds remains after rendering.
